TEXT.TITLE: DEXTER <DEX> UNITS SETS LICENSE WITH TOYOTA UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Dexter Corp's Hysol Aerospace and Industrial Products Division said it agreed to license its engineering adhesives to Toyota Motor Co's Toyoda Gosei unit. The two units will jointly develop a line of structural adhesive and application techniques for the automotive and certain other industries. Reuter
